> *Undertake with lightness, grow with freedom*

## 1. Brand Foundation

### Core Duality

The heart of Seja Livre is the balance between rational method and emotional transformation:

| RATIONAL (Navy) | ‚Üî | EMOTIONAL (Burgundy) |
|-----------------|---|---------------------|
| Confian√ßa | | For√ßa |
| Profissionalismo | | Paix√£o |
| Base estrat√©gica | | Transforma√ß√£o interior |
| Clareza de m√©todo | | Alma e coragem |

### Brand Essence

- **Name:** Seja Livre (Be Free)
- **Symbol:** Dente-de-le√£o (Dandelion) - Seeds flying freely represent movement, passion, transformation, and freedom
- **Archetype Formula:** Libertadora (60%) + Mentora S√°bia (40%)
- **Core Promise:** "10x mais resultados com 10x menos esfor√ßo"
- **Target Audience:** Carolina - female entrepreneurs working 12+ hours/day, trapped by their own businesses

### Personality Translation

| Personality | Visual Expression |
|-------------|-------------------|
| **Libertadora** | Open layouts, dispersal animations, gold accents for freedom moments |
| **Direta** | Bold headlines, single-column focus, high contrast, no decorative clutter |
| **Acolhedora** | Warm neutrals, rounded corners (8-16px), soft shadows, real photography |
| **Mentora S√°bia** | Serif typography (Lora), step progressions, real numbers over vague claims |

---

## 2. Design Principles

### 1. Leveza com Subst√¢ncia (Lightness with Substance)
Every interface element should feel light and breathable while communicating real value. Ample whitespace is not emptiness - it's room to breathe.

**Do:** Use generous padding and margins. Cards float with subtle shadows.
**Don't:** Pack information tightly. Use heavy borders or cramped layouts.

### 2. Provoca√ß√£o Visual (Visual Provocation)
Design should challenge assumptions before offering solutions, mirroring "provoque primeiro, acolha depois."

**Do:** Lead with a provocative visual element before revealing the comfortable solution.
**Don't:** Start with generic welcome messages or stock imagery.

### 3. Transforma√ß√£o Progressiva (Progressive Transformation)
Use the Navy ‚Üí Burgundy ‚Üí Gold gradient metaphor throughout interactions. This is the brand story in color.

**Do:** Apply gradient metaphor to user journeys. Entry points in navy, engagement in burgundy, completion in gold.
**Don't:** Use random color assignments without meaning.

### 4. Autoridade Acess√≠vel (Accessible Authority)
Balance professional credibility with approachable warmth. Never cold, never flippant.

**Do:** Use Lora for body text to establish credibility. Pair with Century Gothic for headlines.
**Don't:** Use pure black text or clinical sans-serif for body.

### 5. Convite, N√£o Press√£o (Invitation, Not Pressure)
CTAs invite participation rather than demanding action. Premium brands invite; they don't chase.

**Do:** Use inviting button language ("VAMOS?", "Quero conhecer").
**Don't:** Use countdown timers, fake scarcity, or aggressive pop-ups.

### 6. Sementes em Movimento (Seeds in Motion)
Subtle motion that echoes dandelion seeds dispersing freely. Never jarring or attention-seeking.

**Do:** Use gentle fade-ins, soft float animations, organic easing curves.
**Don't:** Use aggressive animations, bounces, shakes, or spinning.

### 7. Espa√ßo para Respirar (Space to Breathe)
Treat whitespace as a design element, not empty space.

**Do:** Use 60% neutral backgrounds. Apply 48-64px section padding.
**Don't:** Fill every pixel with content. Stack sections without breathing room.

---

## 3. Color System

### Locked Brand Colors

| Color | Name | Hex | Pantone | Usage |
|-------|------|-----|---------|-------|
| ![#191F3A](https://via.placeholder.com/20/191F3A/191F3A) | Navy Profundo | `#191F3A` | 5255 C | Headings, Primary CTAs |
| ![#81171F](https://via.placeholder.com/20/81171F/81171F) | Borgonha | `#81171F` | 1955 C | Transformation CTAs, Emphasis |
| ![#ECECEC](https://via.placeholder.com/20/ECECEC/ECECEC) | Cinza Claro | `#ECECEC` | - | Balance, breathing space |

### Primary Scale - Navy Profundo (RATIONAL)

| Grade | Hex | Usage |
|-------|-----|-------|
| 50 | `#F4F5FA` | Lightest backgrounds |
| 100 | `#E8EAF4` | Trust sections |
| 200 | `#D0D4E8` | Borders |
| 300 | `#B3B9D6` | Disabled states |
| 400 | `#8E96BE` | Placeholder text |
| 500 | `#6A74A3` | Secondary elements |
| 600 | `#4F5785` | Links |
| 700 | `#363D62` | Hover states |
| **800** | **`#191F3A`** | **Headings, Primary CTA** |
| 900 | `#0D1022` | Dark mode base |

### Secondary Scale - Borgonha (EMOTIONAL)

| Grade | Hex | Usage |
|-------|-----|-------|
| 50 | `#FDF5F5` | Light passion backgrounds |
| 100 | `#FAEAEA` | Subtle warmth |
| 200 | `#F4D2D4` | Soft accent |
| 300 | `#E8A9AE` | Decorative |
| 400 | `#D67680` | Dark mode CTAs |
| 500 | `#BE4652` | Secondary elements |
| 600 | `#9E2A35` | Action buttons |
| **700** | **`#81171F`** | **Transformation CTA** |
| 800 | `#5E1118` | Deep emphasis |
| 900 | `#3D0B10` | Darkest |

### Accent Scale - Ouro da Liberdade (FREEDOM)

| Grade | Hex | Usage |
|-------|-----|-------|
| 500 | `#E0B83D` | Freedom CTA, Golden moments |
| 600 | `#C99B1F` | Hover states |
| 700 | `#A67E15` | Deep gold, Text on light |

### Semantic Colors

| Status | Light | Base | Dark |
|--------|-------|------|------|
| Success | `#E8F7EE` | `#2DA55D` | `#1A6B3A` |
| Warning | `#FEF7E6` | `#D4A017` | `#8B6914` |
| Error | `#FEF0EE` | `#D93830` | `#8E2520` |
| Info | `#EEF2FD` | `#3B5ED9` | `#283D8E` |

### Brand Gradients

```css
/* Transformation - Signature (Navy ‚Üí Burgundy) */
background: linear-gradient(135deg, #191F3A 0%, #81171F 100%);

/* Freedom (Gold ‚Üí Light) */
background: linear-gradient(135deg, #E0B83D 0%, #FAEFC5 50%, #F8F8FA 100%);

/* Sunrise - Complete Journey */
background: linear-gradient(135deg, #191F3A 0%, #81171F 40%, #E0B83D 100%);
```

### Color Distribution (60-30-10)

| Proportion | Colors | Purpose |
|------------|--------|---------|
| **60%** | neutral-50, accent-50 | Backgrounds - "Leveza" |
| **30%** | primary-600/700/800 | Structure - Trust |
| **10%** | secondary-600/700, accent-500 | CTAs - Transformation |

## 4. Typography

### Font Families

| Role | Font | Style | Usage |
|------|------|-------|-------|
| **Headings** | Century Gothic | Geometric sans-serif | Headlines, CTAs, Authority |
| **Body** | Lora | Elegant serif | Body text, Warmth, Trust |
| **Code** | JetBrains Mono | Monospace | Technical content |

### Font Stacks

```css
--font-primary: 'Lora', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', serif;
--font-secondary: 'Century Gothic', 'Century', 'URW Gothic', 'Arial', sans-serif;
--font-mono: 'JetBrains Mono', 'Fira Code', 'Consolas', monospace;
```

### Type Scale (Major Third - 1.25 ratio)

| Token | Size | Usage |
|-------|------|-------|
| xs | 0.64rem (10.24px) | Tiny labels |
| sm | 0.8rem (12.8px) | Captions, small text |
| base | 1rem (16px) | Body text |
| lg | 1.25rem (20px) | Large body, lead text |
| xl | 1.5625rem (25px) | H5 |
| 2xl | 1.953rem (31.25px) | H4 |
| 3xl | 2.441rem (39.06px) | H3 |
| 4xl | 3.052rem (48.83px) | H2 |
| 5xl | 3.815rem (61.04px) | H1 |
| 6xl | 4.768rem (76.29px) | Hero display |

### Heading Styles

| Level | Font | Size (Desktop) | Weight | Line Height |
|-------|------|----------------|--------|-------------|
| H1 | Century Gothic | 3.815rem | 700 | 1.2 |
| H2 | Century Gothic | 3.052rem | 700 | 1.2 |
| H3 | Century Gothic | 2.441rem | 700 | 1.375 |
| H4 | Century Gothic | 1.953rem | 600 | 1.375 |
| H5 | Century Gothic | 1.5625rem | 600 | 1.375 |
| H6 | Century Gothic | 1.25rem | 600 | 1.5 |
| Body | Lora | 1rem | 400 | 1.5 |

### Typography Colors

| Use | Color | Hex |
|-----|-------|-----|
| Headings | primary-800 | `#191F3A` |
| Body text | neutral-700 | `#4A4A5A` |
| Muted text | neutral-600 | `#656578` |
| Emphasis | secondary-700 | `#81171F` |
| Links | primary-600 | `#4F5785` |

## 5. Spacing & Layout

### Spacing Scale (8pt Grid)

| Token | Value | Usage |
|-------|-------|-------|
| 0 | 0 | No spacing |
| 0.5 | 4px | Tight inline spacing |
| 1 | 8px | Compact elements |
| 1.5 | 12px | Small padding |
| 2 | 16px | Standard padding |
| 3 | 24px | Card padding |
| 4 | 32px | Large gaps |
| 6 | 48px | Section gaps |
| 8 | 64px | Major section gaps |
| 12 | 96px | Page sections |

### Semantic Spacing

| Token | Value | Usage |
|-------|-------|-------|
| xs | 4px | Tight spacing, icons |
| sm | 8px | Compact elements |
| md | 16px | Default component spacing |
| lg | 24px | Card padding, section gaps |
| xl | 32px | Major section spacing |
| 2xl | 48px | Page section breaks |
| 3xl | 64px | Large section padding |
| 4xl | 96px | Hero sections |

### Container Max-Widths

| Size | Max-Width | Usage |
|------|-----------|-------|
| sm | 640px | Blog posts, articles |
| md | 768px | Medium content |
| lg | 1024px | Standard layouts |
| xl | 1280px | Wide content |
| 2xl | 1536px | Full-width layouts |

### Section Padding

| Viewport | Vertical | Horizontal |
|----------|----------|------------|
| Mobile | 48px | 16px |
| Tablet | 64px | 32px |
| Desktop | 96px | 64px |

### Breakpoints

| Name | Min-Width | Device |
|------|-----------|--------|
| sm | 480px | Large phones |
| md | 640px | Small tablets |
| lg | 768px | Tablets |
| xl | 1024px | Small laptops |
| 2xl | 1280px | Desktops |

## 6. Components

### Buttons

#### Primary Button
```css
.btn-primary {
  background: #191F3A;
  color: #F8F8FA;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 16px;
  transition: all 200ms ease-out;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  background: #363D62;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(50, 50, 62, 0.1);
}
```

#### Secondary Button (Burgundy)
```css
.btn-secondary {
  background: #81171F;
  color: #F8F8FA;
}

.btn-secondary:hover {
  background: #9E2A35;
}
```

#### Accent Button (Gold)
```css
.btn-accent {
  background: #E0B83D;
  color: #191F3A;
}

.btn-accent:hover {
  background: #C99B1F;
}
```

#### Button Sizes

| Size | Height | Padding | Font Size |
|------|--------|---------|-----------|
| Small | 32px | 8px 16px | 14px |
| Medium | 40px | 12px 24px | 16px |
| Large | 48px | 16px 32px | 18px |

### Form Inputs

```css
.input {
  background: #FFFFFF;
  border: 1px solid #DCDCE4;
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  font-family: 'Lora', serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  transition: border-color 150ms ease-out, box-shadow 150ms ease-out;
}

.input:focus {
  border-color: #6A74A3;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px #E8EAF4;
  outline: none;
}

.input:error {
  border-color: #D93830;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px #FEF0EE;
}
```

### Cards

```css
.card {
  background: #FFFFFF;
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 24px;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(50, 50, 62, 0.05);
  transition: transform 200ms ease-out, box-shadow 200ms ease-out;
}

.card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  box-shadow: 0 10px 15px rgba(50, 50, 62, 0.1);
}
```

### Border Radius

| Token | Value | Usage |
|-------|-------|-------|
| sm | 4px | Chips, tags |
| md | 8px | Buttons, inputs |
| lg | 12px | Cards |
| xl | 16px | Large cards, modals |
| full | 9999px | Pills, avatars |

### Shadows (Warm Navy Undertone)

```css
--shadow-sm: 0 1px 2px rgba(50, 50, 62, 0.05);
--shadow-md: 0 4px 6px rgba(50, 50, 62, 0.1);
--shadow-lg: 0 10px 15px rgba(50, 50, 62, 0.1);
--shadow-xl: 0 20px 25px rgba(50, 50, 62, 0.1);
```

---

## 7. Motion & Interaction

### Animation Principles

1. **Effortless Flow** - Motion feels as natural as dandelion seeds drifting
2. **Purposeful Presence** - Every animation serves a function
3. **Gentle Invitation** - Interactive elements invite, never demand
4. **Breathing Space** - Motion creates rhythm and pause
5. **Organic Curves** - Natural patterns, never mechanical

### Timing Tokens

| Token | Value | Usage |
|-------|-------|-------|
| instant | 0ms | Focus rings, immediate feedback |
| fast | 100ms | Micro-interactions, hover states |
| normal | 200ms | Standard transitions |
| slow | 300ms | Modal enter, emphasis moments |
| slower | 400ms | Complex animations |

### Easing Curves

```css
--ease-out: cubic-bezier(0.16, 1, 0.3, 1);    /* Elements entering */
--ease-in: cubic-bezier(0.7, 0, 0.84, 0);      /* Elements exiting */
--ease-in-out: cubic-bezier(0.45, 0, 0.55, 1); /* Moving elements */
--ease-emphasized: cubic-bezier(0.34, 1.56, 0.64, 1); /* Success moments */
```

### Microinteraction Examples

```css
/* Button Hover */
.btn {
  transition: transform 100ms ease-out, box-shadow 100ms ease-out;
}
.btn:hover {
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

/* Card Hover */
.card {
  transition: transform 200ms ease-out, box-shadow 200ms ease-out;
}
.card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
}

/* Input Focus */
.input {
  transition: border-color 100ms ease-out, box-shadow 100ms ease-out;
}
```

### Reduced Motion Support

```css
@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  *,
  *::before,
  *::after {
    animation-duration: 0.01ms !important;
    animation-iteration-count: 1 !important;
    transition-duration: 0.01ms !important;
    scroll-behavior: auto !important;
  }
}
```

## 8. Voice & Microcopy

### Button Text Patterns

| Context | Do | Don't |
|---------|-----|-------|
| Primary CTA | "VAMOS?", "Quero minha liberdade" | "Submit", "Compre agora" |
| Secondary | "Ver detalhes primeiro" | "Saiba mais" |
| Confirmation | "Conta comigo" | "Confirmar" |

### Error Messages (Supportive, Not Blaming)

| Context | Do | Don't |
|---------|-----|-------|
| Email invalid | "Ops, esse e-mail n√£o chegou direito. Pode conferir?" | "E-mail inv√°lido" |
| Required field | "Preciso dessa informa√ß√£o pra te ajudar melhor" | "Campo obrigat√≥rio" |
| System error | "Algo deu errado do nosso lado. Pode tentar de novo?" | "Erro 500" |

### Success Messages (Warm, Grounded)

| Context | Do | Don't |
|---------|-----|-------|
| Form sent | "Recebi sua mensagem. Te respondo em at√© 24h. Do meu cora√ß√£o para o seu." | "Formul√°rio enviado com sucesso!" |
| Payment | "VAMOS! Voc√™ t√° dentro. Olha seu e-mail." | "Pagamento aprovado." |
| Signup | "Bem-vinda! Voc√™ acabou de dar o primeiro passo." | "Cadastro realizado!" |

### Form Field Labels

- Name: "Como posso te chamar?"
- Email: "Seu melhor e-mail" + helper: "Prometo: s√≥ mando o que vale a pena"
- Phone: "WhatsApp (se quiser)"
- Challenge: "Qual sua maior dor hoje?"

### Loading States

- Page loading: "Preparando tudo pra voc√™..."
- Form submitting: "Enviando com carinho..."
- Processing: "Processando. Quase l√°..."

**Avoid:** "Aguarde...", "Carregando...", "Loading..."

### Signature Closings

- "VAMOS?"
- "Do meu cora√ß√£o para o seu üíô‚ù§Ô∏è"
- "Existe um caminho mais f√°cil."
- "Agora √© com voc√™."

## 9. Accessibility

### Color Contrast (WCAG AA)

| Pairing | Ratio | Status |
|---------|-------|--------|
| primary-800 on white | 13.5:1 | AAA |
| primary-800 on neutral-50 | 12.8:1 | AAA |
| secondary-700 on white | 8.2:1 | AAA |
| accent-500 on primary-800 | 8.5:1 | AAA |

### Focus States

```css
:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px #F8F8FA, 0 0 0 4px #6A74A3;
}
```

### Touch Targets

- Minimum: 44px √ó 44px
- Recommended: 48px √ó 48px
- Spacing between targets: 8px minimum

### Required Elements

- All form inputs have visible labels
- Error messages are specific and actionable
- Images have appropriate alt text
- Links have underlines
- Color is never the only indicator

---

## 10. Quick Reference

### CSS Variables

```css
:root {
  /* Colors */
  --color-primary-800: #191F3A;
  --color-secondary-700: #81171F;
  --color-accent-500: #E0B83D;
  --color-neutral-50: #F8F8FA;
  --color-neutral-700: #4A4A5A;

  /* Typography */
  --font-primary: 'Lora', Georgia, serif;
  --font-secondary: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif;

  /* Spacing */
  --space-sm: 8px;
  --space-md: 16px;
  --space-lg: 24px;
  --space-xl: 32px;
  --space-section: 96px;

  /* Radius */
  --radius-sm: 4px;
  --radius-md: 8px;
  --radius-lg: 12px;

  /* Shadows */
  --shadow-sm: 0 1px 2px rgba(50, 50, 62, 0.05);
  --shadow-md: 0 4px 6px rgba(50, 50, 62, 0.1);
  --shadow-lg: 0 10px 15px rgba(50, 50, 62, 0.1);

  /* Motion */
  --duration-fast: 100ms;
  --duration-normal: 200ms;
  --duration-slow: 300ms;
  --ease-out: cubic-bezier(0.16, 1, 0.3, 1);
}
```

### Pre-Publishing Checklist

- [ ] Does it sound like Ju√ßan√£ talking to an amiga empres√°ria?
- [ ] Does the design have room to breathe (leveza)?
- [ ] Does the interaction invite rather than pressure?
- [ ] Are we showing method over mystery?
- [ ] Would Carolina recognize her pain in the first 3 seconds?
- [ ] Is it free of em-dashes and guru language?
- [ ] Does it terminate with energy ("VAMOS?") or warmth ("Do meu cora√ß√£o")?
